structuredData.name: Image to Text Converter

hero.title: Image to Text with Pinpoint Accuracy
hero.tagline: Our free Image OCR tool extracts text from any picture—JPG, PNG, screenshots—and transforms it into editable text or structured Markdown while preserving the original layout.

playground.title: Try the Image to Text Converter Now
playground.description: Drag and drop your JPG, PNG, or photo. No registration, no hassle.

guide.title: How It Works
guide.description: Upload any image file. Our AI engine analyzes the visual data, recognizes characters and structure, and outputs clean, editable text in seconds.

exampleImages.alt: Works well even with crumpled or folded invoices.
Example of a handwritten equation for OCR

how_to.title: How to Convert an Image to Text in 3 Simple Steps
how_to.description: From a picture to editable text in under 30 seconds. It’s that easy.

steps.title: Step 1: Upload Your Image
steps.description: Click the upload button or drag and drop your image file (JPG, PNG, WEBP, etc.) directly into the designated area.

media.alt: A user dragging a JPG file into the upload box of the Image OCR tool.

steps.title: Step 2: Start the OCR Conversion
steps.description: Our AI will automatically scan the image, identify the characters, and process the text and structure.

media.alt: Animation showing a scan line moving across an image and text appearing on the other side.

steps.title: Step 3: Copy Your Text
steps.description: Your extracted text will appear instantly. Click the copy button to grab it for use in any editor or application.

media.alt: The output text box with a highlighted "Copy Text" button.

features.title: The Smartest Way to Convert Images to Text
features.description: Our features are designed to solve the biggest headaches in text extraction, delivering clean results every time.

items.title: Pinpoint Accuracy
items.description: Leveraging advanced AI models, our tool minimizes errors and correctly interprets characters, context, and punctuation, reducing your need for manual edits.

items.title: Broad Image Format Support
items.description: We handle all the common formats. Whether it’s a high-resolution PNG, a standard JPG, or a modern WEBP, just upload it and we’ll do the rest.

items.title: Intelligent Formatting Retention
items.description: Don't lose the structure of your original document. Our tool recognizes lists, paragraphs, and spacing to deliver text that is organized and easy to read.

items.title: Truly Free, No Strings Attached
items.description: This is not a limited trial. Our image-to-text converter is free for everyone. No sign-up, no credit card, and no watermarks on your output.

items.title: Multi-Language Recognition
items.description: Our OCR engine is trained on a massive dataset, enabling it to accurately recognize and transcribe text in over 100 different languages automatically.

items.title: Fast Processing Speeds
items.description: Your time is valuable. Our optimized process ensures your image is uploaded, scanned, and converted in just a few seconds, even for high-resolution photos.

items.question: What image formats can I upload to convert to text?
items.answer: You can upload most standard image formats, including JPG, JPEG, PNG, BMP, and WEBP. If you have a different format, try converting it to one of these first.

items.question: Is it really free to convert an image to text?
items.answer: Yes, our online Image OCR tool is 100% free. We plan to introduce premium features for heavy users in the future, but the core functionality will remain free.

items.question: How accurate is the text extraction from a photo?
items.answer: For clear, high-quality images with standard fonts, the accuracy is extremely high. Results for blurry photos, complex backgrounds, or highly stylized fonts may vary.

items.question: Will the OCR tool maintain the original formatting from my image?
items.answer: Our tool is designed to be layout-aware. It recognizes paragraph breaks, lists, and general structure to provide an output that is much cleaner than a simple "wall of text". For complex layouts, we recommend our structured Markdown output.

items.question: Is there a limit to the file size I can upload?
items.answer: For our free service, the image file size is limited to 5MB to ensure fast processing for all users. This is sufficient for the vast majority of images and screenshots.

items.question: Do I need to sign up or provide an email?
items.answer: No. We believe in providing immediate value. You can use our image-to-text converter without any registration or personal information required.

items.question: Can I use this to convert a picture of a table to text?
items.answer: Yes, our AI can recognize tables within an image. It will attempt to extract the data in a structured format, which you can then easily copy into spreadsheet software like Excel or Google Sheets.

items.question: Are my uploaded images safe?
items.answer: Absolutely. We respect your privacy. Your images are securely processed and are automatically deleted from our servers shortly after the OCR conversion is complete.

items.question: Can I process multi-page PDFs?
items.answer: Free tier supports single-page PDFs. Pro users can process up to 10 pages with batch extraction and priority processing.

cta.title: Ready to Unlock Text from Your Images?
cta.description: Stop retyping and start converting. Drag and drop your image now to get fast, accurate, and perfectly formatted text in seconds.
